short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts online shopping prices on web pages to a desired currency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tiny extension that helps you while you shop online. If you are shopping on online stores with a different currency then yours (e.g. AliExpress, Gearbest, etc.), this extensions will convert for you a selected price to your currency. 
Currently supported currencies: USD, EUR, GBP, ILS, INR, CNY.

This extension needs permission to read and change all data on websites, because it shows a popup on the page. 
* NONE of the user data is being collected, what so ever.
